## UBCO CSC Workshop Materials

```{r, workshops, results = 'asis'}
workshops <- read.csv("files/workshops.csv", header = T)

for (i in 1:nrow(workshops)) {
  title <- workshops[i,1]
  description <- workshops[i,2]
  url <- workshops[i,3]
  cat('<a href="',url,'" target = "balnk"><button class="landingPageButton"><h2>',title,'</h2><p>',description,'</p></button></a>')
}
```
